backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods defined.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing UI styling and text‑change updates tied to two Promise Day page features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing each frontend file’s purpose in the Promise Day app.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based style reset and theme variables defining light/dark palettes and base element styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading Poppins font and mounting the React app root.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Simple root component that renders the Promise Day page.
frontend/src/components/EmojiShowerOverl: Overlay component that generates falling emoji animations with bursts and continuous rain.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor instance tied to the user’s identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Authentication provider and hook managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and status flags.
frontend/src/index.css: Extended global styles adding romantic theme colors, pink button palette, emoji-fall animations, and utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React entry script configuring providers and rendering the app with Internet Identity and React Query.
frontend/src/pages/PromiseDayPage.tsx: Promise Day greeting page with photos, messages, emoji rain, and a pink reveal button toggling an extra promise message.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content paths, extended OKLCH-based color palette, typography, layout, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, implemented features, and requirements for the Promise Day greeting website.
